00027 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 void CWndEventListener::onEvent
00029     (
00030     EventId aEventId,
00031     uint32  aEventData,
00032     void*   aEventDataPtr
00033     )
00034 {
00035     CWnd* thisWindow = dynamic_cast<CWnd*>( this );
00036     UINT  windowsEventId = WM_EVENT( aEventId );
00037 
00038     ASSERT( thisWindow != NULL );
00039     ASSERT( aEventId < EVENT_ID_CNT );
00040 
00041     if( IsWindow( thisWindow->m_hWnd ) )
00042         thisWindow->PostMessage( windowsEventId, (WPARAM)aEventData, (LPARAM)aEventDataPtr );
00043 }
